Armor.Name: Cloak
Armor.Description: This cloke is said to be sewn from magical thread and have the power to escape a invaders.

Armor.Name: KnightsArmor
Armor.Description: Forged from a secret guild using unknown alloys.

Weapon.Name: staff
Weapon.Description: It is said a great lightening storm sheared branches from the Tree Of Life. These branches were widdled by monks into staffs.

Weapon.Name: Longsword
Weapon.Description: One of a cash of weapons taken after a seige.

Armor.Name: Cape
Armor.Description: Just encough to keep warm on a cold night.

Armor.Name: ChainMail
Armor.Description: This armor is heavy and makes it difficult to escape your enemy.

Weapon.Name: Saber
Weapon.Description: A rare find this weapon does maximum damage

Weapon.Name: Mace
Weapon.Description: A crude weapon with a hanndle made of wood wrapped in leather, the heavy head has percing spikes.

Armor.Name: LeatherArmor
Armor.Description: Sewn together fron the animals you have hunted over the years. Serves two protection from the elements and in battle.

Item.Name: Jems
Item.Description: A leather pouch filled with rubies
